sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162520 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , ( SELECT NVL( MAX(COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM)+1 ,1) FROM YE162520 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ) , #taxVvalKrnCd# , #comrCdtrNm# , #comrCdtrResnRegnNum# , #comrCnttPridBgnnDt# , #comrCnttPridEndDt# , #comrLoanItrtRate# , #comrPclttAmtftAggr# , #comrPrnilSum# , #comrItrtSum# , #comrDducSum# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE162520 SET COMR_CDTR_NM = #comrCdtrNm# , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM = #comrCdtrResnRegnNum# , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT = #comrCnttPridBgnnDt# , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT = #comrCnttPridEndDt# , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE = #comrLoanItrtRate# , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR = #comrPclttAmtftAggr# , COMR_PRNIL_SUM = #comrPrnilSum# , COMR_ITRT_SUM = #comrItrtSum# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM = #comrCalnSeilNum# AND TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = #taxVvalKrnCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162520 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM = #comrCalnSeilNum# AND TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = #taxVvalKrnCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD) AS TAX_VVAL_KRN_NM , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR
FROM YE162520
WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(SYSTEMKEY) totcnt FROM YE162520 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162520 ( YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutseptCd# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM)+1,1) FROM YE162520 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #comrCdtrNm# , #comrCdtrResnRegnNum# , #comrCnttPridBgnnDt# , #comrCnttPridEndDt# , #comrLoanItrtRate# , ((NVL(#comrPrnilSum#,0) + NVL(#comrItrtSum#,0)) , #comrPrnilSum# , #comrItrtSum# , (((NVL(#comrPrnilSum#,0) + NVL(#comrItrtSum#,0)) * 0.4) , #ectnFlTrnrCtlYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162520 SET YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM=#comrCalnSeilNum# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , COMR_CDTR_NM=#comrCdtrNm# , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM=#comrCdtrResnRegnNum# , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT=#comrCnttPridBgnnDt# , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT=#comrCnttPridEndDt# , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE=#comrLoanItrtRate# , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR=((NVL(#comrPrnilSum#,0) + NVL(#comrItrtSum#,0)) , COMR_PRNIL_SUM=#comrPrnilSum# , COMR_ITRT_SUM=#comrItrtSum# , COMR_DDUC_SUM=(((NVL(#comrPrnilSum#,0) + NVL(#comrItrtSum#,0)) * 0.4) , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN=#ectnFlTrnrCtlYn# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM=#comrCalnSeilNum# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162520 WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM=#comrCalnSeilNum# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

sqlMap.select: SELECT YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162520 WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM=#comrCalnSeilNum# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CLUT_SEPT_CD) AS CLUT_SEPT_NM , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162520 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
YRTX_BLGG_YR=#edacRvyy#
CLUT_SEPT_CD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE162520 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr#
CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162520 WHERE 1=1
YRTX_BLGG_YR = #searchKeyword#
CLUT_SEPT_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

YRTX_BLGG_YR = #searchKeyword#
